name: Who let the gas out?
description:
Everyone knows the struggle when you have to let it go, but you don't want anyone to notice. Make sure to keep moving and hide in empty corners to not get embarassed. Try to "survive" as long as possible without getting caught or exploding.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys for Movement
  • Hold Space to let it go slowly and rather quiet
  • Press E for a short, but loud, burst

Unfortunately it didn't quite turn out the way I wanted it to be. I had to cut many features due to not having time for most of the week, but I wanted to participate in the jam anyway, so here it is. I hope it is still fun and at least a little entertaining.
